channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Automobile Fire; INC#1617; 09:27PM; Eb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3d08pz0; Lake View Terrace; KNOCKDOWN: 22 firefighters extinguished the fire in 27 minutes with no injuries reported. The driver was the sole occupant of the motorhome and had no medical complaints. LAFD are picking up equipment and CHP will reopen all lanes of traffic once it is safe to do so. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E298 E77 E98 T98 WT77; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Automobile Fire; INC#1617; 08:42PM; Eb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3d08pz0; Lake View Terrace; Large motorhome (Class A "Diesel pusher") fully involved in fire, towing a boat with propane tanks exploding. There are no injuries reported. CHP has closed EB210 Fwy at Osborne. 9-1-1 call was received at 8:42PM. The call was received as an auto fire and additional resources were requested by the fire officer. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E298 E77 E98 T98 WT77; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1679; 11:13PM; 602 W 53rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GOrYKs; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the converted attic of the single family dwelling. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E266 E46 E66 RA46 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1679; 10:57PM; 602 W 53rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GOrYKs; Vermont Square; One story, single family dwelling with smoke showing from the attic. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E266 E46 E66 RA46 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1368; 07:04PM; 9821 S Grandee Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/40duQY7; Watts; The first arriving task force and LA County Fire Engine 9 are handling a storage shed fire. There is no extension to the residence and no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E221 E233 E264 E64 RA14 RA64 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1368; 06:53PM; 9821 S Grandee Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/40duQY7; Watts; Garage to the rear of a single family dwelling is well involved in fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. LA County Fire is also on scene with one engine. ; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E221 E233 E264 E64 RA14 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - FIRE OUT; INC#1102; 04:37PM; 1710 N Fuller Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GJBwXa; Hollywood; Firefighters responded to a reported structure fire and found a 5 story, modern style apartment building with nothing showing. During the investigation, they encountered someone who reported hearing an explosion. They located an apartment with a lithium-ion battery which had been charged and it 'exploded' with the fire extinguished by automatic fire sprinklers. Additional resources requested to assist with water removal from multiple units (number unknown). One patient is being evaluated for possible non-life threatening burn injury. The 9-1-1 call was received at 4:18PM. No further details; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E41 RA82 T27; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0833; 01:34PM; 20152 W Gilmore St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KEhJcJ; Winnetka; KNOCKDOWN: 44 firefighters extinguished the fire in 28 minutes with no injuries reported. The homes on either side were defended from any damage. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC17 CM40 CM42 E273 E293 E305 E72 E84 E90 E93 EM14 EM17 RA104 RA84 RA89 T105 T73 T93; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0833; 01:20PM; 20152 W Gilmore St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KEhJcJ; Winnetka; The fire appears to have originated in an exterior (attached?) carport and extended into the back of the house (well involved). Firefighters are in the offensive mode working both to extinguish the fire and defending the Delta exposure (East) from any damage as flames lap out of the windows. Two additional task forces were requested (one requested on initial size up and a 2nd requested by the incident commander.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC17 CM42 E273 E293 E305 E72 E73 E84 E93 EM14 RA104 RA84 T105 T73 T93; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0833; 01:06PM; 20201 W Gilmore St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L6CLlP; Winnetka; One story, single family dwelling with smoke and fire showing from the attic. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E305 E72 E84 RA84 T105; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart
